about_the_game:
-Is this determination really your own will?

The morning of the beginning. That day when raindrops fell on a morning glory with the dawn in the background.

The time I tied my ponytail in a knot because I really wanted to change my life.
I woke up early to cheer up that person who was crying.

In a world where people treat you as if you have to be special to deserve to live.
In order to face the despair of not being able to become anything, boys and girls persisted in not giving up.

When they looked back at the end of their perseverance, they saw a rainbow-colored shine pushing them back,
A rainbow-colored glow pushing at our backs, a flash of cool breeze drifting around the world.
That was the news of our youth.

Remember who you are, who someone took from you.
Don't give up on yourself, don't allow yourself to be compromised in the slightest.

It is always the longing after the rain that turns the dull sky into clear skies.
To hold on to this news, you have to live your life, struggling until the dawn.

Then this is a story about regaining your true self.

Project;YouthSignal - Our Adolescence, Deliverance to All Youth

About the game

This work is a text adventure.
You can progress the story by clicking on the screen.

Genre : ADV for all ages, youth perversion
About choices : Yes (no route branching)
Voice ：Full voice except for some parts
Play time ：About 40 to 50 hours

content_descriptors.notes: Some mild violence in the film, and very rare direction and descriptions that incite fear.

short_description: --Is that determination really your own will? An adolescent perversion adventure presented by creators who all started their challenges from scratch! This game will be a simple text adventure.
